Key Match Events: Washington Wizards beat the Chicago Bulls 125-107
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bub Carrington led the team in minutes played with 31
Justin Champagnie played 21 minutes in the win, scoring 15 points and grabbing two boards
Others: Bub Carrington went No. 14 overall in the most recent NBA Draft
Justin Champagnie played two seasons at Pitt from 2019-21, earning All-ACC honors in 2020-21
